articles.author: Silvia Sciorilli Borrelli
articles.title: Luxottica founder Leonardo Del Vecchio dies aged 87 - Financial Times
articles.description: Entrepreneur raised in an orphanage started work at 14 and rose to become Italy’s second-richest man
articles.content:
Leonardo Del Vecchio, the billionaire founder of eyewear group Luxottica who rose from a childhood spent in an orphanage to become Italy’s second-richest man, has died at the age of 87.
